t: A Psalm{H4210} of David{H1732}. I will sing{H7891}{(H8799)} of mercy{H2617} and judgment{H4941}: unto thee, O LORD{H3068}, will I sing{H2167}{(H8762)}.

I will behave myself wisely{H7919}{(H8686)} in a perfect{H8549} way{H1870}. O when wilt thou come{H935}{(H8799)} unto me? I will walk{H1980}{(H8691)} within{H7130} my house{H1004} with a perfect{H8537} heart{H3824}.

I will set{H7896}{(H8799)} no wicked{H1100} thing{H1697} before mine eyes{H5869}: I hate{H8130}{(H8804)} the work{H6213}{(H8800)} of them that turn aside{H7750}; it shall not cleave{H1692}{(H8799)} to me.
A froward{H6141} heart{H3824} shall depart{H5493}{(H8799)} from me: I will not know{H3045}{(H8799)} a wicked{H7451} person.

Whoso privily{H5643} slandereth{H3960}{(H8764)}{(H8675)}{H3960}{(H8781)} his neighbour{H7453}, him will I cut off{H6789}{(H8686)}: him that hath an high{H1362} look{H5869} and a proud{H7342} heart{H3824} will not I suffer{H3201}{(H8799)}.

Mine eyes{H5869} shall be upon the faithful{H539}{(H8737)} of the land{H776}, that they may dwell{H3427}{(H8800)} with me: he that walketh{H1980}{(H8802)} in a perfect{H8549} way{H1870}, he shall serve{H8334}{(H8762)} me.

He that worketh{H6213}{(H8802)} deceit{H7423} shall not dwell{H3427}{(H8799)} within{H7130} my house{H1004}: he that telleth{H1696}{(H8802)} lies{H8267} shall not tarry{H3559}{(H8735)} in my sight{H5869}.
I will early{H1242} destroy{H6789}{(H8686)} all the wicked{H7563} of the land{H776}; that I may cut off{H3772}{(H8687)} all wicked{H205} doers{H6466}{(H8802)} from the city{H5892} of the LORD{H3068}.
